title: how to playing on NA server in foreign country with a lower pin
body: i am in Korea , i need a vpn accelerator(or anything that can lower my NA game pin) , any recommendations ?

replies.body: Since you're playing on the NA server but you're located in Korea, there's bound to be a little lag simply because of the physical distance between you and the servers. I'd suggest looking into the possibility of transferring servers to one that's closer, and you can look into account transfers [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924#h2q2).
